name: Garlic Prawns
author: kathie
summary: This is a great easy prawn marinade, they are great on the BBQ, we put them out as appetizers but they can also be a main course. I've also sauteed them with the marinade and used the sauce with pasta or just lapped it up with French bread! ENJOY.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried basil, or to taste
directions: In a glass dish, mix together the olive oil,  mustard, garlic, lemon juice, orange juice, basil and white wine
Add the prawns, and stir to coat
Cover, and let marinate for 1 hour
Heat an outdoor grill to high heat
Grill for 3 to 5 minutes, turning once, until pink
If desired, reserve marinade; transfer to a saucepan and bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes
